anyway thats it guys thank you so much for wtching if we hit 15 THOUSAND LIKES! we will DO A GIVEAWAY of 15 gift cards! Leave your name down below and comment why you should get a GIFT CARD!
citation: Henry, P. J., & Sears, D. O. (2002). The symbolic racism 2000 scale. Political Psychology, 23(2), 253-283.
image: Image credit: Rowland Scherman, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
q01: It's really a matter of some people not trying hard enough; if blacks would only try harder they could be just as well off as whites.
q02: Irish, Italian, Jewish and many other minorities overcame prejudice and worked their way. Blacks should do the same.
q03: Some say that black leaders have been trying to push too fast. Others feel that they haven't pushed fast enough. What do you think?
q04: How much of the racial tension that exists in the United States today do you think blacks are responsible for creating?
q05: How much discrimination against blacks do you feel there is in the United States today, limiting their chances to get ahead?
q06: Generations of slavery and discrimination have created conditions that make it difficult for blacks to work their way out of the lower class.
q07: Over the past few years, blacks have gotten less than they deserve.
q08: Over the past few years, blacks have gotten more economically than they deserve.
